sentence.Network_en: Curiously, the struggle to survive has greatly improved her health.
sentence.Network_cn: 奇怪的是，她拼命求生的抗争使得她的健康状况大有好转。

sentence.Network_en: He's curiously innocent about what this means to other people.
sentence.Network_cn: 关于这对其他人意味着什么，他一无所知，这一点颇不寻常。

sentence.Network_en: The woman in the shop had looked at them curiously.
sentence.Network_cn: 商店里的那个女人曾经好奇地看着他们。

entry.def: If you are curious about something, you are interested in it and want to know more about it.

example.ex: Steve was intensely curious about the world I came from...
example.tran: 史蒂夫非常想了解我以前生活的那个世界。

entry.tran: 稀奇古怪的;不寻常的;难以理解的
entry.def: If you describe something as curious, you mean that it is unusual or difficult to understand.

example.ex: There is a curious thing about her writings in this period...
example.tran: 她在这期间的著作与以往有所不同。

example.ex: The pageant promises to be a curious mixture of the ancient and modern...
example.tran: 游行盛典将会是古老与现代的奇特融合。

means.word_mean: 1. in a manner differing from the usual or expected;

auth_sentence.content: Some of them curiously are manufactured here in India.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some of them curiously are manufactured here in India.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some of them curiously are manufactured here in India.

auth_sentence.content: These songs aren't so much melancholy as curiously troubled.
auth_sentence.res_content: These songs aren't so much melancholy as curiously troubled.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These songs aren't so much melancholy as curiously troubled.

auth_sentence.content: Other crimes against women get curiously brief coverage.
auth_sentence.res_content: Other crimes against women get curiously brief coverage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Other crimes against women get curiously brief coverage.

sentences.en: His boy bent curiously to the skeleton of the buck.
sentences.cn: 他的儿子好奇地弯下身去看鹿的骸骨。

sentences.en: He looked curiously at the people.

means.word_mean: 奇异地,奇怪地;说来古怪

sentences.cn: 她感到莫名其妙地满足。

sentences.en: He complained of feeling curiously weak and faint.
sentences.cn: 他抱怨说感到莫名地虚弱和头晕。

sentences.en: He felt curiously detached from what was going on.
sentences.cn: 他觉得很奇怪，对于正在发生的事情感到超然物外。

sentences.en: Curiously enough he had never seen the little girl.
sentences.cn: 说也奇怪,他竟从未见过那个小女孩。

sentences.en: Her daughter’s accident had left her curiously unmoved.
sentences.cn: 她对女儿的事故竟然无动于衷，真令人奇怪。

sentences.en: Her remarks were curiously lacking in perception.
sentences.cn: 她的评论缺乏洞察力，这真让人费解。
